Desc.eng: How can I help you, Meester Van Helsing?
If you wish. After your father had overthrown the reign of vampires, he left us here with the Pact and his former allies in charge.
Indeed. They created unbelievable machines and creatures. They slowly turned this city into a modern metropolis.

Oh, what could possibly go wrong when you play with forbidden knowledge? They went insane! They started a civil war and almost destroyed Borgova. Finally Professor Fulmigati won. The others have disappeared and we became the new subjects in his grand experiment.
